title: Cannot Login - Even with 100% correct details?
body:
the account I am posting this off is my smurf account. 

I cannot log in to my main account - every time I try it comes up with "Username or password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password, click here." 

I have reset my password multiple times and it still says the same thing. 

I have even tried "forgot your username" only to find out my username is 100% the right one. 

It's like I have been locked out of my account???

replies.body:
It could be connection issues, but I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
